attributes.action: remove minor health and safety issues which are stifling common sense
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to remove stupid minor health and safety issues that affect normal human activity.
EG , CONKER PLAYING.
FLYING FLAGS FOR A FETE IN CASE THEY HURT SOMEONE.
HANGING STREET BASKETS IN CASE THEY FALL ON SOMEONE,

AND OTHER STUPID ISSUES THAT ABOUND IN OUR DAILY LIFE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
